reviews.review_msg: wicked class but the material tossed at you is lots. Be prepared to work very hard. Lectures are cool but he talks very fast so be ready. Very hard to get an A in this class as you will have to work very hard, but cool class
Lecture & material is extermely interesting.  Exams and paper are exteremely hard though, so you have to work your ass off to get a decent grade.
He's an excellent professor.  He makes the material simple to understand and exciting to learn.  Definately one of the most dynamic and intersting profs I've had.

People, if you can stay away from him....DO IT !!! He's so arrogant and marks a two year course very hard. No matter what you put down as an answer, it's not complete. He's going for his ten-year and students have to suffer for it. Thank you very much.
I thought he was great!  Maybe he's tougher on upper divison classes.. but I really enjoyed his class and I thought he was smart and clear in his lectures.
Great lecturer, very interesting and an expert in the field. Exams also fairly easy.

The guy knows what he's talking about, he wrote the book after all...however, seemed like his lectures involved more ranting with brief reviews of the material, his TA did more actual teaching. I learned alot more during tutorial's, highly recommend attending those besides the fact that they're mandatory
